note: Anagram pseudonym for the author of the someday-to-be-finished farcical fantasy novel, The Night Plummer & The Mockemortician. He/Him.

fields.name: Profile picture
fields.value: Portrait of the artist as an inverted reflection of an old man in a shaving mirror, eyes and lips cast upward in perplexed contemplation.

fields.name: Header
fields.value: Mucky green remnant of Erie Canal affectionately known by my family as Turtle Paradise. Have also seen a number of lil green herons, great blue herons, rat snakes, and beavers.

fields.name: Purpose
fields.value: This account will now be used for general topics. If you want my writing related posts follow me at @saposcat@indieauthors.social
